website_summaries.verdict: For those who seek a versatile electric shaver with a truly spectacular cleaning system, the 8900 is one to consider. Closer than average shave, and helpful trimming accessories.
pros: Very close, clean shave by electric razor standards
Individual heads can be replaced, not an expensive process
Easy to clean and maintain between shaves
cons: Requires multiple passes for complete shave
Will not run while plugged into charger

customer_reviews.title: Possibly wrong component
customer_reviews.text: My item doesnt work right. I think you sent the wrong charging station. The charging plug fits the shaver but noy the charging station.i cant run the cleaner ir use the station to charge the shaver. What dk i do. I cant even see if it works because the battery is dead. It just arrived today. The plug wont go into the back connection
customer_reviews.author: Eric Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Honestly worst purchase I'd ever had
customer_reviews.text: Despite the many Positive reviews, this thing is certainly not worth the money. Honestly worst purchase I'd ever had. The trimmer attachment works great however, which sadly fooled me into keeping it outside of the return window. When I needed to actually shave and use the razor head, it was completely worthless, far inferior in shaving ability to a $5 bic. I spent a solid 10 minutes shaving and missed so many hairs, it won't even get any of the hairs on my neck or under my jaw. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Therhys

customer_reviews.title: worst shave ever
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this. My original old inexpensive base model with older style heads shaves closer, faster and with no pain. This new design rips the hair and tugs the hair on my neck and cheeks and turns shaving into an ordeal worse than a dull razor. Couldn't get it to cut any of my neck whiskers that with ONE swipe my less expensive Norelco could. What a deep disappointment and frivolous cost to have to discover on my own. I never actually could get a complete shave with this being it was torturous and an easy completion with the older and cheaper design. NOT recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Baron

customer_reviews.title: Save the money and buy a razor without the Smartclean System
customer_reviews.text: PROS: - The razor itself is great. Shaves closer than any other electric razor I've had. - The beard grooming head feels as powerful as a stand-alone beard grooming razor - Smartclean system was great while it lasted (see below) CONS: - Smartclean system broke after a few weeks of use. I initially thought it ran out of solution, because the cartridge replacement light came on, but I didn't get around to buying replacement cartridges for a while. I recently bought the cartridges only to find out the replacement light is just permanently on, and it won't start the cleaning process.
customer_reviews.author: V.L.

customer_reviews.title: The shaver works great, but on page 15 of the instruction manual ...
customer_reviews.text: The shaver works great, but on page 15 of the instruction manual says to use the small plug to plug in the cleaning station. I only received a plug that fits the shaver - NO SMALL PLUG FOR THE CLEANING STATION. Without the plug for cleaning station it doesn't even make a good paper weight. In the past it was easy to send a message to the seller and tell them about something like this, and the problem was usually solved. But I couldn't find that link. It seems like a poor way to contact the seller or manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Glenn Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Norelco electric shavers for over 25 years and kinda just accepted the fact that I was sacrificing a really close shave for the convenience of an electric shaver. However, the 8900 model really blew that theory. The improvement is far more than I expected when upgrading from the last one I purchased nearly eight years ago (and it was still running strong, BTW). And the cleaning system works great too! No more worries of neglecting to clean my shaver. Just turn the cleaning system on and leave it alone. This shaver was well worth the investment! (I wasn't given this shaver in exchange for a positive review. I bought it and am satisfied with my purchase.)
customer_reviews.author: D. Lahrman

customer_reviews.title: Worst Shave Ever
customer_reviews.text: I read a review online stating this was a good rotary shaver (at $200 it should be), but one guy on the reviews said do not think this will shave like the older version. Sure enough, I got to the point where I am trying to saw the whiskers off my face. The shaver could not cut overnight growth and I had a light beard because it couldn't keep up. I finally $40 Phisco which is doing a great job. Checking back to the article I read, it only compared Norelco devices, turned out to be an ad acting like a review.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K.

customer_reviews.title: quiet, effective and easy on the face
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Norelco and after several years decided to try another brand/type (Braun). It was a good quality but was noisy and pulled a bit. I decided to buy another Norelco rotary. The toughest part of that decision was deciding which model. I am very happy that I bought this. It is much quieter and smoother. I am back with Norelco and cannot imagine using any other electric shaver.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: SmartClean charging system is junk.
customer_reviews.text: The 8900 is an excellent razor that provides close comfortable shaves. Two caveats: 1. It runs through blades quickly. 2. The cleaner charger system that came with the razor lasted only about 70 days before it stopped charging the razor. Soon after, the unit stopped cleaning the razor as well. It makes a lot of angry noise, but does nothing. The SmartClean charging system cost $85.00 to replace. I now use a charge cord from a previous Norelco razor to charge my shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Chas. B.

customer_reviews.title: Self-cleaning shaver.
customer_reviews.text: Shaves cleaner than a much older model Norelco had been using. Cleaning system makes shaver so much more convenient to use. Shaver can be used wet or dry. The base unit is both a charger/cleaning station that charges and cleans shaver head after each use, and has an auto shut-off. No more disassembly of shaver head to clean it. Beard/trimmer attachment easy to use on razor. Everything was easy to setup and use. Be sure to read user manual before using razor. Cannot rate battery life since system is new to me. Review from user perspective, cannot answer technical questions on product
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Smart Clean Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: The Smart Clean System does not properly plug into the charging cord, which makes the Smart Clean useless. However, the charge cord does directly charge the Shaver. The cord is designed to fit both, but without a functioning cleaning system that was included, I can only give this purchase 3-stars. Too bad, because I absolutely love the Shaver, most effective Norelco I have ever owned. If the seller rectifies this matter by sending me a functioning Smart Clean and new cord that is operable, I will be glad to change to 5 stars...ball is in your hands...ALN
customer_reviews.author: Informed Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver, really handy features
customer_reviews.text: I love the self cleaning feature. The battery life is more than sufficient and the storage stand is a nice looking unit on our sink area.. not the normal clunky "plug it in and leave it laying on the counter' style.. but then Philip is usually a safe choice for satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: The Judge

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Norelco razors for 40 years. This is the WORST one I've used, hands down. Easy cleaning and comfortable to hold and shave with. BUT...it doesn't shave as closely as I'd like. It does NOT shave longer hairs at well at all. I often times have to trim them with scissors before shaving. And it is TERRIBLE at getting to hard to reach places (like right under my nose) as the shave heads are too far from the edges of the housing. Will be buying a different razor.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Philips Norelco Electric Shaver smooth shave
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. No bumps, nor rash, no PAIN (sensitive old skin). I had just purchased another wet/dry Norelco model like the original models (from a local store) and it was a nightmare for 21 days; lots of hair pull, and irritated skin. I took a gamble and ordered this model. Glad I did. I've used it: wet, dry, with pre-shave face oil soap, and Electra-Shave pre shave, all methods provide a close shave with no problems or pain.
customer_reviews.author: FL

customer_reviews.title: Does not shave worth a hoot.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Norelco razors most of my adult life. My last one shaved great but after 18 years the battery would not hold a charge so I bought this one. Worst purchase ever. The cleaner works well and it is easy to was out but it does not shave very good. when you finish using it your face feels like you have yesterdays stubble of growth. If you have a mustache be careful because if you get to close it pulls your hair. I should have bought the cheaper model which was more like my old one. I have a battery operated travel Norelco the works great. I would never recommend this razor it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Philips Norelco Electric Shaver 8900 with SmartClean, Wet & Dry Edition S8950/90
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Philips Norelco Electric Shaver 8900 with SmartClean, Wet & Dry Edition S8950/90 for my husband. He is very pleased with the style and performance of this Norelco Electric Shaver. Norelco is the only brand of razor he has used for decades and as long as it stands up to it's name he will continue this tradition. I don't usually rate items 5 stars, simply because I don't "love" things. However I'm doing this review on behalf of my husband and he gives it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Niagara,NY

customer_reviews.title: I bought this razor with the cleaning stand. According ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this razor with the cleaning stand. According to the instructions, the razor head cleaning stand needs to be charged to work. However, the power cord will not plug into the cleaning stand plugin for charging. If another cord for the cleaning stand was supposed to be included, it was not included. If an cleaning stand plug in adapter for the power cord was supposed to be included, it was not.I am unable to charge the cleaning stand for use to clean the razor head. Unhappy about not being able to use the cleaning stand I ordered with the razor.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Jorski

customer_reviews.title: Bought to shave my head ...Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I got this to shave my head because regular razors are not easy to use and a friend recommended an electric. So to start off the fact that it is a wet dry shave is awesome however it takes FOREVER to shave my head with it and still dose not do a good job. I have to go over the same spot 6-7 times to get it shaved and even then it was not smooth. I finally gave up and went back to a disposable razor.
customer_reviews.author: MGarrett

customer_reviews.title: What I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a braun wet and dry series 5 that only lasted a few years before breaking. I was usually a braun only since most norelco products never got the job done but this does the job. Unboxing the razor took a few mins but once you follow directions you are up and running within mins till razor is charged. Wet or dry this does an excellent job cutting hair unless extremely long over a couple inches. It is definitely the smoothest shave I've ever had. My wife is extremely happy about the smoothness. The only real complaint is the 4 hour clean time but a small price to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Phillips

customer_reviews.title: This shaver is good! Close shave
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the feeling I was looking l for. This shaver is good! Close shave, no hair, overall great shaver, Now after trying a few of norelco 's shavers such as norelco sensotouch, the sensation of this shaver is not quite as good, I have a sensitive skin, so I get a few bumps here and there and my neck section gets irritated. Yes it is a closer shave than sensotouch but just because of that feeling after shave I would recommend sensotouch over this one . I ll try to find out if i can use any of the senso replacement blades on this shaver though.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Go get yourself a razor
customer_reviews.text: Folks, This product (and it's hefty price tag) is undeniable proof that marketing works !! This $150 plus shaver is just as good as the $8 shaver in Target. Yeah those that don't even have a brand name. And I'm not kidding. But of course, this waaaaay fancier, cute even, and has a very good battery to boot. But as far as getting a good shave, please go get yourself a Gilette razor. This thing does everything, except that
customer_reviews.author: L. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Takes up a good deal of counter space
customer_reviews.text: This shaver occupies a lot of counter space because of the cleaning attachment. The shaver seems to work well, but attaching the sideburn clipper is an extra step that wasn't needed on my old Norelco. They give you a coupon for 15% off on the cleaner, but then they are out of it when you go on the website. I think this model is being discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Philip L. Carl

customer_reviews.title: Choose Panasonic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few years ago and so aggravated to this day that I searched my order history just to write this review. Disappointed in the shaver. Really wished I had went with Panasonic the double smooth edge razor again. It had set the standard. This Norelco trio of circles only does well if you literally shave everyday. Too patchy if you skip even one day.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Bolyard

customer_reviews.title: This shaver worked pretty well but my job required a closer shave than ...
customer_reviews.text: This shaver worked pretty well but my job required a closer shave than this could give. Depending on your beard growth you might need to wait a day or so between shaves for it to work perfectly and I didn't have that luxury. Also it takes longer to get a good shave from this than just getting the razor out and doing it. I was really hoping this would work out to be better than my razor but it just didn't. Overall it felt well made and for the most part did what it was made for so that's the reason for 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mac k.

customer_reviews.title: Ok not great
customer_reviews.text: It does an ok job. At first I loved it, no mess when shaving, it took a little longer than before to shave but not by much. After a couple weeks I went to compare the shave to my oneblade, and there is quite a difference. The norelco 8900 would get close but leave a little stubble and the oneblade gets a lot closer. Not including cleaning the mess, oneblade wins in speed and performance. Cleaning time included norelco wins but does not come as close to the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: That being said this is a pretty good electric shaver
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I'm a razor person. There are sometimes when I don't want to go through the hassle of getting out the razor for a full shave so I decided to try an electric for the first time since college. Is it as close as a razor... certainly not, and it never will be. That being said this is a pretty good electric shaver. As long as I use this daily or every other day you can't tell the difference. I will probably still go to the razor for a big event, but I've already started using this as my daily shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon W

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed all expectations
customer_reviews.text: Finally! An electric shaver that works as advertised. I've purchased 2-3 other electric razors over the years but always send them back. I really hate shaving, so I gave it one more try. This one is a keeper. Shaves very close, is very comfortable, quiet and easy to clean. Some good ole ElectroShave makes this rating up to 6 stars. After finding this shaver, I'll never go back to blades.
customer_reviews.author: captjeff

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the first high end electric razor I've had, and I don't grow a lot of facial hair, but I do shave every day and it takes the stubble out very well. Can use in shower or with shaving cream. Very close shave and leaves my face very smooth, where as my last razor, my face would still be a little rough and it would cut my face. This one doesn't leave my face sore or hurt after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: James Forman

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I shave in the shower, it was important to me that my return to electric razor shaving accommodate that habit. This one does and it does so quite well. I use it with my boar's hair brush and bar lather and get a satisfactorily close shave. Not quite as close as a blade, but so much more convenient. I have used the razor on dry skin and it worked well; no significant discomfort and a good close shave. The trimmer is perfect for keeping my sideburns looking clean. The purchase was made with trepidation (I've used a blade for so long!) but I am pleased that I made it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed that it doesn’t glide across my face so well when I dry shave, however a little bit of water on the face, shave butter, or something like that it gets the job done really well. I like that the charging/cleaning station work independently I can set the shaver in its place have it cleaned ready for next time and charge when I need to i usually get a weeks worth of shaves on one charge.
customer_reviews.author: joshua dawes

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's me but I didn't seem to get a very good shave from it. I wound up buying the old fashion flat head Braun S3 from KMART which was on sale and I like it much better. I think it's more of an individual preference.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: Length cut ?
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered this last week and though it looks amazing I was a bit sad that when I looked forward to shaving I was not able to get it low as I wanted. Left a good amount of hair length and not sure if maybe there is a setting to get a closer cut or what but for those reasons I give it a 3 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning system dose not work
customer_reviews.text: When I received it there was a power cord for the shaver but no cord for the cleaning system and the shaver cord dose not fit at all. The other problem is that there is no buttons on the cleaning system. The shaver work but that is it. Disappointed it the cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Bsnapshot

customer_reviews.title: Solid electric shaver!
customer_reviews.text: Just used the shaver for the first time and it's the best electric I've used to date. Did a good job on my jawline which I was most concerned with. Easy to put together as well its basically idiot prof. I've seen a few reviews saying it doesnt do well at all, well of course it won't if you have more than 2 days growth it's not an industrial hedge trimmer so dont even try it. I'd give it 5 stars but it's the first day, but so far I'm impressed would make a decent holiday gift for anyone that uses electrics often.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Fricke

customer_reviews.title: Very good unit
customer_reviews.text: Used the panasonic 5 95 for 2 years. The Panasonic is a bit faster and it is a lot noisier. For that reason I changed. It is very quiet, does most the same job. I little slower but the end result is the same. Cleans well in the station. Quiet and faster so I have to say it is a better unit. Specially for the noise level.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardohers

customer_reviews.title: My husband said he liked his old razor better
customer_reviews.text: My husband said he liked his old razor better, this one he needs to pass it a few times to get a good shave, the cleaning box is kind of an inconvenience as it takes precious extra space
customer_reviews.author: elena del toro

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL - THE BEST SHAVER
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is really wonderful - I have to admit: I used it today and I got the best shave in my life !!! I have never imagined that electric shaver can shave the face better than any other razors. NOTE: in the instruction it's written we need 21 days trial and conversion in order to adjust our skin to a new shaver and feel the closeness of Philips Norelco, but... I felt it today - in one day it did its work perfectly in case, when I have very thick face hairs. In a word - this is the BEST SHAVER - I recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Tigran Tarbiyan

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as i expected during and after shaving
customer_reviews.text: razor doesnt seem to run at a high enough speed and seems to slow down alot when shaving. Not as comfortable as i expected during and after shaving. I cant tell if they are clean or not by using the cleaner/charging attachment. Think a cheaper model might be better.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: So I’m not utterly disappointed. But I’m not happy with this product either. I’ll just say I think the blades are weak, cheap and dull. Cleaning system is cool. But over rated. Also replacement blades are about half the price of a new razor. So I’ll never buy on of these again.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Razor
customer_reviews.text: I switched from a Braun to this Norelco. It works fine except that the dock where you clean it quit working shortly after I got it. It charges, but doesn't clean. I still like the razor though. The Braun was also good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this shaver... a bit pricey, but you get what you pay for! I take it with me in the road for traveling, and clean under water after each use. I keep the cleaning base at home and clean using that when I’m home (once every 2-3 weeks) cleaning solution cartridges are readily available at Cvs, Walgreens and Target
customer_reviews.author: Brian and Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Phillips Norelco is an awesome Electric shaver
customer_reviews.text: Phillips Norelco is an awesome Electric shaver. My husband loves it and the charger. It does do a close and clean shave and He really needed the attachment to keep his mustache trimmed. The charger cleans, the razor and does a lot of things for the shavers up keep! Read the ad for the Shaver on Amazon. You will be amazed at what the Shaver can do. This is a must to keep any man happy!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Harmon

customer_reviews.title: great  close shave.
customer_reviews.text: Work s great Nice close shave with no pulling The cleaner sets up the sgaver for the next time . The adjustable trimmer attachment works well enough to give my self a hair cut
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: I just was not impressed about it. It did not work as well as I hoped it would. I was more of a chore to shave that compared to a standard blade razor, it did not do well with shaving cream, and I had particular difficulty on my neck area. I have the razor a try for three weeks like Philips recommended, but ultimately was not satisfied with how it worked for me. Understand, it just wasn't for me. Other people may have better results.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: NICE RAZOR
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it so far. I hope the Jet Clean Solution helps the blades last much longer - particularly considering how much new replacement blades cost!
customer_reviews.author: SOUTHLAKE MAMA

customer_reviews.title: Different from old Norelco but very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Last Norelco cordless razor lasted 15 years. Worried this one would disappoint but it shaved closer and has really good battery life. The blade holder mechanism isn’t attached and easy to drop. Who’s it was attached. The on off button is easy to inadvertently hit while shaving. Over all I’m very pleased and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James Michael Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great razor for the money
customer_reviews.text: This razor works great. I have used Norelco razors for many years. If you liked previous Norelco razors don't hestite in buying this one. I highly recommend the cleaning station. It's a nice added feature.
customer_reviews.author: Terrill Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this Norelco. I shave my head daily, so I wear these out pretty quickly. This model is easier to take apart and clean than previous models - the clip holding the blade is much easier to twist off. I just wish this unit had the turbo mode that some cheaper models have.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for Christmas. He absolutely loves it and has VERY picky taste. Was right in the middle of all of the products I looked at. I told him I paid MUCH more and he believed me so it must be good!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This razor is amazing. I’ve owned norelco razors most of my lift and this is the best one I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Harryt

customer_reviews.title: Not as close a shave
customer_reviews.text: On buying this I expected the modern technology to give a closer shave than my old Panasonic but that is not the case
customer_reviews.author: Know-It-All

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works well. He has to clean it with solution after each use and that is the key to it working well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Personally, I prefer my Braun.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice enough shaver, however, having switched from a lower end Braun to this more expensive three head I was quite disappointed. It's harder and more time consuming to use and doesn't get as close. It also irritates a bit more. It's ok but I will be returning to Braun in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie T Brown

customer_reviews.title: This razor is JUNK
customer_reviews.text: The blades only last about 4 months and have to be replaced. The biggest problem is the razor isn't even 6 months old and the head on the razor keeps falling off when trying to shave. Don't waste your money. I have used Norelco razors for the last 40 years, and I will never buy another razor from Norelco. Good job Norelco you just lost a long time customer.
customer_reviews.author: Len LaBrecque

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I might have to give up my razor. I usually use this as a 'clean up' when I'm traveling in the car. My old one was used for 10 yrs. No real need for change for a quick 'clean up'. I WAS WRONG. This product gives me such a close shave. I might have to get another to have in the BR instead of the razor.....
customer_reviews.author: roy glover

customer_reviews.title: Norelco 8900 fails to give a good shave!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Norelco 8900 as a replacement of my 10 + year old Norelco. I find the 8900 doesn't give me as clean of a older Norelco used to give me, the 8900 will always leave me a 'Peach Fuzz' on my face No matter how much I shave my face over & over. I am not as pleased with this expensive shaver as I had hoped to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey W.

customer_reviews.title: I'm a Believer!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. After contemplating switching to electric for years (and getting feedback from dozens of friends, coworkers, and anyone else that appeared clean shaven) I decided to take the jump. I cannot be more pleased with how this shaver performs. Closeness of shave, ease of use, product design, battery life, etc all exceed expectations. This is truly a great shaver and if you're looking to make the switch from razor to electric, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sam B

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning stopped working 3 months into usage. Very annoyed, paid over 200 dollars and stuck with it now
customer_reviews.author: JNegs

customer_reviews.title: Make sure there are 2 power plugins
customer_reviews.text: Make sure there are 2 power plugins, the one for the shaver didn't work on the cleaner on mine. I received only one for the shaver with no way to power the cleaner and the one for the shaver wouldn't plug into the cleaner. Save all the packaging and take photos of how it's packed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: For me, it was a huge let down.
customer_reviews.text: Razor chewed up my face and left me with a face full of razor bumps. I returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: C. McLeod

customer_reviews.title: This is a good shaver!! Just not for my head!!
customer_reviews.text: This shaver works perfectly!! Just not on my head!! Sooo!! I returned it without any problems!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Andrus

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY/TIME
customer_reviews.text: Literally will not cut anything. Just pulls your skin. what an embarrassing gift to give a husband. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Severe skin reaction
customer_reviews.text: While the shaver worked well on my head, the shaver gave me the worst reaction around the neck area which I've never had previously. I certainly wouldn't say I have the most sensitive skin but it certainly made it unusable. This aside the shaver also felt like it was under powered. First time I've had to return a product to Amazon and pleased with the ease.
customer_reviews.author: Sluggabed

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: You really get the quality you pay for. I was using one of the cheap notelcos and it was a difficult shave. This shave is close, comfortable, and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: The shaver is excellent with a close shave after two years of daily use. The smart clean system has stopped cleaning and only charges the shaver now. Can this be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Moolah

customer_reviews.title: Great shave for decent price
customer_reviews.text: Great dry shave and easy cleaning (especially with station) detachable head is annoying but I knew that going in.
customer_reviews.author: Colter

customer_reviews.title: Quietest shaver ever.
customer_reviews.text: The shaver actually sounds cheaply made but it really isn't. Great shave at a decent price. It's time to retire the Braun.
customer_reviews.author: Michael - Pittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: Just used it for the first time and it’s awesome. Never had a nice electric shaver and quite ...
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time and it’s awesome. Never had a nice electric shaver and quite supprized at how well it works. I would recommend and the cleaning station is great as well
customer_reviews.author: Andy Janssen

customer_reviews.title: The best I've owned in over 30 years.
customer_reviews.text: By far the best shaver I've ever owned. Been using electric for over 30 years and this model is so comfortable I almost look forward the shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Spalding

customer_reviews.title: Shaves great!
customer_reviews.text: The shaver does give a great shave. My father-in-law who no longer trusts himself to use a blade raves about the good job it does. But the plug will not fit into the cleaner like it is supposed to so we can't clean it properly. Am I missing a cord? It sounds like it is supposed to be the same cord that charges the shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Endicott

customer_reviews.title: this is one of the best purchases I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the best purchases I have ever made. I have always used very expensive foil shavers but never again, this shaver works way better and does not irritate my skin, love it.
customer_reviews.author: troy martens

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shaver is good, but complicate sistem push beard styler. The clean system is ridiculous, ACME roadrunner style.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Gastón

customer_reviews.title: Excellent razor
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. He says it is the best razor he has used. Will probably get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Won't hardly cut a 2 day growth, worst Norelco I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item as I was disappointed in its performance. It did not perform well in the shower as I had hoped. I purchased a Remington straight electric instead.
customer_reviews.author: Will C Morin

customer_reviews.title: The very best electric shaver... period!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably close shave and the battery charge lasts longer than expected. The perfect shaver for anyone who doesn’t want to get nicks or cuts. I highly recommend this shaver which is exactly the style my father used. A true rite of passage! Great product and will always own one! Yes... it’s that good!
customer_reviews.author: MITCHELL C AYERS

customer_reviews.title: GREAT setup. Best electric shaver yet
customer_reviews.text: GREAT setup. Best electric shaver yet. Cleaner system is effective. Still not as close a shave as a razor, but for daily use it's perfect. Also use it for both face and shaving head and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great but could use explanation
customer_reviews.text: Works great but very little guidance about how to deal with the washing accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Davis

customer_reviews.title: Trust Philips
customer_reviews.text: This was a anniversary gift from my wife, and I have been used it for 4 years, still as new. Nice quality, love it. I always trust the brand name product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy-Z

customer_reviews.title: LAST LONG TIME!
customer_reviews.text: My last shaver lasted for 13 years about time for a new upgrade - stayed with the same type shaver as the last one lasted so long Love this brand and they have been great to deal with
customer_reviews.author: James D. Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: My bad. It does shave closer than my old one ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my old Norelco Spectra 8894XL. I have to keep the old one as well since this one does not have a trimmer which I use a lot for the sideburns and around the ears between haircuts. I would not have chosen this one had I was more attentive to the specs. My bad. It does shave closer than my old one however, thus the third star.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Larochelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shaver.  First one I can use that does not cause burn.
customer_reviews.text: The added cleaner is gigantic! Haven't needed to use it yet. Very easy to clean with simple water from faucet. A little expensive but best one I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: JAP73

customer_reviews.title: No close shaves.
customer_reviews.text: My husband was disappointed in this electric shaver. After using the shaver for onle a couple of months he went back to using his old electric shaver. He has a light beard but he could not get a close shave.
customer_reviews.author: Candace A. Estill

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this item I bought an open box. It said all parts were there but it is missing the cleaning stand.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Great smooth shave (as long as you go in circles, cleaning function works great, and cartridges can also be refilled with JetClean if you want to save a little.
customer_reviews.author: mistaM

customer_reviews.title: Longrun not so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item back in December however I noticing now that the electronic washing unit is starting to malfunction and not dry the razor. Can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: D. DANIEL

customer_reviews.title: One of the better shavers I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Even after a month of use I still have trouble getting a real close shave, need to pass through certain areas 3 or more times. Outside from that it does what it's supposed to and the trimmer is great for when I let my beard grow out. The little shell is great too, for protecting the shaver when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right for the shower, but not a time saver.
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit slower than my old Remington, and broader. Not as close of a shave I think. Have to spend more time shaving, but being able to us it in the shower makes all of the difference in the world. A wet face doesn't improve the shave. The trimmer is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: GreyBird4u

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father in law and he loves it. The price is great for all the functions you get for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Shave is great, cleaner is awful.
customer_reviews.text: The shaver is actually awesome. What is terrible is the large cleaner contraption. It’s bulky, ugly, heavy and the liquid leaks everywhere. I’d rather just clean the head myself. Good idea but terrible execution.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but excellent saver
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but I get a very close shave from it... Better than the Gillette razors I had been using. The cleaning function of the unit works as expected. Nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: its been 10 years since I upgraded shavers this works better than any other razer I think it shaves as close as a blade and without iratating my skin
customer_reviews.author: DAN WIMER

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you clean and keeps itself clean.
customer_reviews.text: Have to love this one. Fast, sharp and clean cutting. Programmed cleaning cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Martin E.

customer_reviews.title: It seems to run fast and does a good shave. I like plugging the cable into the ...
customer_reviews.text: The motor noise is less than my old unit. It seems to run fast and does a good shave. I like plugging the cable into the shaver to charge the battery. Easier to use than charging stand.
customer_reviews.author: John Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: regular razor blades are working better.
customer_reviews.text: the razor looks fancy and expensive. It moves smoothly on face without any strong stimulation, but to shave perfectly, regular razor blades are working better.
customer_reviews.author: hyunshik kim

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning Unit Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this razor in January 2017 and already the cleaning unit has broken. The top part that snaps down onto the razor's charger won't stay down and keeps popping up. I have had no problems with the actual razor itself.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Goodnight

customer_reviews.title: I have been using Philips shavers for many years. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Philips shavers for many years. My previous one broke down after 6 years, and i decided to treat myself to this new one. I was excited to use it, but its really really weak and slow. One sha e took my almost 10 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the slower motor rpms. Does a great job of cutting facial hair.
customer_reviews.author: John F Ahnefeldt

customer_reviews.title: Razor ok, not so much with the cleaning system!
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning system has totally failed within 4 months. The razor cuts well however I miss the trimmer being available all the time. I have had Norelco razors for over 30 years and very disappointed compared to previous razors!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cutter

customer_reviews.title: Not good for old people
customer_reviews.text: Detaching head during shave is difficult. Not good for old people. Removing very often might damage the blade's. It's clear that Phillips wants to sale there cleaning products. Dry shaving is was much better in old shavers. Over all ok.
customer_reviews.author: Yogesh

product_meta.title: Philips Norelco Shaver 8900 with SmartClean, Rechargeable Wet/Dry Electric Shaver with Beard Trimmer Attachment, S8950/90
product_meta.description: Style:With Cleaning StandShave closer and more comfortably with the Philips Norelco Shaver 8900. This wet or dry electric shaver is designed to contour to the curves of your face and cut closer to the skin. Cutting 20% more hair in a single pass and 30% closer to skin, the Shaver 8900 gives you our most advanced shave yet! Included SmartClean system cleans, lubricates, and dries the shave to keep it performing at its best. Fully washable for easier maintenance. SmartClick Beard Trimmer included for precise facial hair grooming. Up to 50 minutes of cordless shaving per full charge Lithium-ion battery also fully charges in 1 hour. Cleaning Indicator Lights LED lights indicate when it is time to recharge your shaver. Travel lock feature helps you avoid wasting battery life.
feature_bullets: Philips Norelco Shaver 8900 is Designed to Contour to the Curves of your face and cut closer to the skin, the included SmartClean system keeps your shaver performing at its best
Enjoy perfection in every pass. The unique shaving blades cut hairs up to 30 percent closer to the skin for always a close and comfortable shave
Each shaving head moves in 8 directions to cut up to 20 percent more hair

Shave wherever and however you'd like. Enjoy a convenient dry shave or a comfortable wet shave with gel or foam, or even in the shower. Includes Smart Clean system, which allows for easy shaver maintenance
The rechargeable Lithium-ion battery delivers the power of a corded shaver without the hassle of a cord. 50 minutes of shaving time, with a 3-level LED battery indicator

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
